description: Research plus Single-Channel Adjustable Pipette, 100-1,000 µL, Eppendorf is one of the safest and most ergonomic pipettes in the world. It is an innovative liquid handling product with the lowest weight and lowest operation forces. This Research plus mechanical pipette has been accoladed with the Bronze "Seal of Quality". Spring-loaded tip cone for reliable tip fit and low tip attachment forces save your energy and time.The Research plus microliter pipette has been developed within the strict criteria which stands for intuitive operation, a perfect balance and minimal operator strain and fatigue.
name: Research plus Single-Channel Adjustable Pipette
